import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link, useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import Header from "../partials/Header"; function SignUp() { const his = useHistory() const [user, setuser] = useState({ name:"", profession:"", dateOfBirth:"", email:"", password:"" }) const onInputeChange = e => { setuser({...user,[e.target.name] : e.target.value}) } const SubmitHandler = async e =>{ e.preventDefault() let myresult = await axios.post("http://localhost:3000/users",user) his.push("") } return (
